title: RP
body:
if i want to give rp to friend, i can choose any amounts to give him?

thanks

replies.body: You can't provide a specific amount, but there are a variety of options to select.  You can also send an RP gift 5 times within 24 hours, per the [Gifting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ).  I hope that helps!
